#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define uint unsigned int
using namespace std;
uint transformation(uint num)
{
    uint temp,revnum=0,rem;
    temp=num;
    while(temp!=0)
    {
        rem=temp%10;
        revnum=revnum*10+rem;
        temp/=10;
    }
    return (num+revnum);
}
bool palindrome(uint num)
{
    uint temp,revnum=0,rem;
    temp=num;
    while(temp!=0)
    {
        rem=temp%10;
        revnum=revnum*10+rem;
        temp/=10;
    }
    if(num==revnum)
        return true;
    else
        return false;
}
int main()
{
    uint num,n,ctr,test;
    scanf("%u",&test);
    while(test--)
    {
        ctr=0;
        scanf("%u",&num);
        while(true)
        {
            if(palindrome(num))
                break;
            else
                num=transformation(num);
            ctr++;
        }
        printf("%u %u\n",ctr,num);
    }
    return 0;
}
